video_prompt: Subtle hair sway, gentle shifting of the racing suit fabric.
image_prompt: Full shot of a young asian woman with medium-length brown hair and bangs, wearing a green and beige racing jacket with various logos (such as "Castrol", "MILFOR", and "SYENR") and a beige mini-skirt with a belt, posing confidently next to a red vintage Formula 1 race car. She smiles warmly at the viewer, with one hand casually placed behind her head. The background shows a sunny outdoor race track with blurred figures of people and other race cars in the distance under a clear sky. The lighting is bright and natural, highlighting the textures of her clothing and the classic design of the race car.
refined_video_prompt: Subtle hair swaying, racing suit fabric gently rippling.
creative_video_prompt_1: Hair violently whips as an unseen gale violently rips the racing suit fabric, sending it flapping like a storm flag. Flames ignite and dance wildly on the nearby tires, while the asphalt beneath trembles, cracking open as if something is clawing its way up. The red racing car shudders, parts warping and twisting as if trying to re-form into a new, monstrous entity.
creative_video_prompt_2: A shimmering rainbow glow emanates from her smile, causing her hair to defy gravity, strands spiraling upward like iridescent smoke. The racing suit stitches unravel, reforming into a swirling galaxy pattern that pulses with soft starlight. The red car below her legs melts into a liquid gold, which then crystallizes into floating origami cranes that ascend into the sky.
creative_video_prompt_3: A low-angle tracking shot glides alongside a sleek F1 car, revealing a captivating model. Her hand dramatically sweeps back her wind-blown hair, revealing a mischievous smile. The camera dramatically zooms in on the intricate racing suit fabric as she subtly shifts her weight, her body language exuding effortless coolness against the vibrant red of the car. Her eyes lock onto the camera, intensifying the cinematic gaze.
